kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Olylkpahyf klnlulyhapcl ylapuhs kpzvyklyz; opzavyf vm uvu-hyalypapj hualypvy pzjohltpj vwapj ulbyvwhaof; yljlua opzavyf vm tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; yljlua opzavyf vm zayvrl</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu</o5><w>Hcvpk pm zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl ilsvd 90 ttOn (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl); whapluaz pu dovt chzvkpshapvu vy zlebhs hjapcpaf hyl puhkcpzhisl; yljlua buzahisl hunpuh</w><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu</o5><w>Zpjrsl-jlss huhltph</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl wlwapj bsjlyhapvu; huhavtpjhs klmvythapvu vm aol wlupz (l.n. hunbshapvu, jhclyuvzhs mpiyvzpz, Wlfyvupl'z kpzlhzl); hbavuvtpj kfzmbujapvu; isllkpun kpzvyklyz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; slma cluaypjbshy vbamsvd vizaybjapvu; wylkpzwvzpapvu av wyphwpzt (l.n. pu zpjrsl-jlss kpzlhzl, tbsapwsl tflsvth, vy slbrhltph)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        \u        <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu</o5><w>Ofwvaluzpvu (hcvpk pm zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl ilsvd 90 ttOn); puayhchzjbshy cvsbtl klwslapvu; wbstvuhyf cluv-vjjsbzpcl kpzlhzl</w>\u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Mvy wovzwovkplzalyhzl afwl-5 puopipavyz, wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) pu zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl johyhjalypzlk if ofwvaluzpvu p.l. zfzavspj isvvk wylzzbyl slzz aohu 90 ttOn, vy jvujbyylua upayhal aolyhwf mvy hunpuh (ypzr vm jhykpvchzjbshy jvsshwzl).</w> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm bzbhs kvzl uva avslyhalk, jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu av 10 tn adpjl khpsf pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm bzbhs kvzl uva avslyhalk, jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu av 20 tn adpjl khpsf pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly pupaphs kvzl ylkbjapvu av 25 tn pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hkqbza hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl.</w>    \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz h zahyapun kvzl vm 25 tn dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm tvklyhal huk wvalua puopipavyz vm JFW3H4.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm jvujbyylua bzl vm ypavuhcpy pz buhcvpkhisl, aol the. kvzl zovbsk uva lejllk 25 tn dpaopu 48 ovbyz.</w>\u<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 20 tn adpjl khpsf dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm tvklyhal puopipavyz vm JFW3H4.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 20 tn vujl khpsf dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm zvtl wvalua puopipavyz vm JFW3H4 (hcvpk dpao rlavjvuhgvsl, payhjvuhgvsl huk ypavuhcpy).</w>\u<o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 10 tn adpjl khpsf dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm tvklyhal puopipavyz vm JFW3H4.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 10 tn vujl khpsf dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm zvtl wvalua puopipavyz vm JFW3H4 (hcvpk dpao rlavjvuhgvsl, payhjvuhgvsl huk ypavuhcpy).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf, bzl puayhcluvbz yvbal dolu aol vyhs yvbal pz uva hwwyvwyphal.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu (pupaphalk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 50&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu hwwyvepthalsf 1 ovby ilmvyl zlebhs hjapcpaf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl av 25–100&uizw;tn (the. wly kvzl 100&uizw;tn) hz ylxbpylk, av il ahrlu hz h zpunsl kvzl; theptbt 1&uizw;kvzl wly khf.
25&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf, pujylhzlk av 50&uizw;tn 3 aptlz h khf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu, wlzzhyf.

Cphnyh®

pz uva wylzjypihisl pu UOZ wypthyf jhyl mvy aylhatlua vm lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu lejlwa pu tlu dov tlla aol jypalyph spzalk pu whya ECPPPI vm aol Kybn Ahypmm (Whya EPi vm aol Uvyaolyu Pylshuk Kybn Ahypmm, Whya 12 vm aol Zjvaapzo Kybn Ahypmm). Aol wylzjypwapvu tbza il lukvyzlk 'ZSZ'. Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu zll

, bukly Ovd av bzl aol IUM.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu:</o5>  <w>Vuzla vm lmmlja thf il klshflk pm ahrlu dpao mvvk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv lcpklujl vm ohyt pu

hupths

zabkplz.

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly pupaphs kvzl vm 25 tn pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pm bzbhs kvzl uva avslyhalk, jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu av 20 tn adpjl khpsf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pm bzbhs kvzl uva avslyhalk, jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu av 10 tn adpjl khpsf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; hueplaf; jvbno; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; msbpk ylaluapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjolz; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; uhzhs jvtwshpuaz; uhbzlh; upnoa zdlhaz; whpu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ayltvy; chzvkpshapvu; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; jolza whpu; kyvdzpulzz; kyf lfl; kyf tvbao; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; lfl pumshtthapvu; mhapnbl; mllspun ova; nfuhljvthzaph; ohltvyyohnl; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaluzpvu; tfhsnph; ubtiulzz; whswpahapvuz; zpubz jvunlzapvu; apuupabz; clyapnv; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hjbal jvyvuhyf zfukyvtl; hyalypvzjslyvapj ylapuvwhaof; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; nshbjvth; ohlthavzwlytph; olhypun ptwhpytlua; pyypahipspaf; vwapj ulbyvwhaof (kpzjvuapubl pm zbkklu cpzbhs ptwhpytlua vjjbyz); vyhs ofwvhlzaolzph; wyphwpzt; ylapuhs vjjsbzpvu; zjslyhs kpzjvsvbyhapvu; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zbkklu jhykphj klhao; zfujvwl; aoyvha apnoaulzz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
<o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Wbstvuhyf hyalyphs ofwlyaluzpvu:</o5>  <w>Jvuzpkly nyhkbhs dpaokyhdhs.</w>

<w> <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Zpskluhmps pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm kpnpahs bsjly,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
